SCSSdkClient.​Object.​SCSTelemetry.​Job
public
SCSSdkClient.​Object.​SCSTelemetry.​Job

Job values. Income, destination, source, etc.

Functions
Job
public Job()

Initialise a job object

Properties
DeliveryTime
public Time DeliveryTime { get; internal set }

In-game time to the moment the job delivery window close

Information
RemainingDeliveryTime

The RemainingDeliveryTime is negative if the delivery is to late

Properties
RemainingDeliveryTime
public Frequency RemainingDeliveryTime { get; protected internal set }

Remaining in-game time until the job delivery window close

CargoLoaded
public bool CargoLoaded { get; internal set }
SpecialJob
public bool SpecialJob { get; internal set }
Market
public JobMarket Market { get; internal set }
CargoValues
public Cargo CargoValues { get; internal set }

Cargo values of an job

CityDestinationId
public string CityDestinationId { get; internal set }

Id of the destination city for internal use by code.  Limited to C-identifier characters and dots.

CityDestination
public string CityDestination { get; internal set }

Name of the destination city for display purposes.  Localized using the current in-game language.

CompanyDestinationId
public string CompanyDestinationId { get; internal set }

Id of the destination company for internal use by code.  Limited to C-identifier characters and dots.

CompanyDestination
public string CompanyDestination { get; internal set }

Name of the destination company for display purposes.  Localized using the current in-game language.

CitySourceId
public string CitySourceId { get; internal set }

Id of the source city for internal use by code.  Limited to C-identifier characters and dots.

CitySource
public string CitySource { get; internal set }

Name of the source city for display purposes.  Localized using the current in-game language.

CompanySourceId
public string CompanySourceId { get; internal set }

Id of the source company for internal use by code.  Limited to C-identifier characters and dots.

CompanySource
public string CompanySource { get; internal set }

Name of the source company for display purposes.  Localized using the current in-game language.

Income
public ulong Income { get; internal set }

Reward in internal game-specific currency.

Cargo Values

Properties
Mass
public float Mass { get; internal set }

Mass in kilograms

Id
public string Id { get; internal set }

Name for internal use by code.  Limited to C-identifier characters and dots.

Name
public string Name { get; internal set }

Name for display purposes.  Localized using the current in-game language.

UnitCount
public uint UnitCount { get; internal set }

How many units of the cargo the job consist of.

UnitMass
public float UnitMass { get; internal set }

Mass of the single unit of the cargo in kilograms.

public float CargoDamage { get; internal set }
